title: Seu Corpo
lyrics:
[Letra de "Seu Corpo" com Otilia]
[Verse 1]
Now you got under my skin
Now I want more than attention
Lit up a fire within
I bet you feeling the tension
Show me your fantasy
Show me how you will be
Taking my loving all in, yeah
Taking my loving all in
[Pre-Chorus]
On my body, on my mind
Kinda thinking we could vibe, mm-mm
[Chorus]
Seu corpo me faz
Oh-oh-oh, para o sol
Seu corpo me faz
Amar, amar, amar, amar, oh
Seu corpo me—
[Verse 2]
Yeah, we are here for the win
Yeah, this is more than just crushing
Lit up a fire within
Every time that we're touching
Tell me your deepest dream
Then let me make it real
Taking my loving all in, yeah
Taking my loving all in

[Pre-Chorus]
On my body, on my mind
Kinda thinking we could vibe, mm-mm
[Chorus]
Seu corpo me faz
Oh-oh-oh, para o sol
Seu corpo me faz
Amar, amar, amar, amar, oh
Seu corpo me—
[Refrain]
Takin’ my lovin' all in, yeah
Takin' my lovin’ all in
[Pre-Chorus]
On my body, on my mind
Kinda thinking we could vibe, mm-mm
[Chorus]
Seu corpo me faz
Oh-oh-oh, para o sol
Seu corpo me faz
Amar, amar, amar, amar, oh
Seu corpo me—
